ygData.subject: Playing Hide and Sneak
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok heres my problem...2 months ago i hit the hide button and the thing never recycled back through.  Well, when i recieved the sneak skill two lvls ago, i put
ygData.messageBody:
Ok heres my problem...2 months ago i hit the hide button and the thing
never recycled back through. Well, when i recieved the sneak skill two
lvls ago, i put 3 points into it hoping to try it out...nothing. The
hide skill is not allowing me to use it. So i thought maybe if i put
some more points into the sneak skill it would cycle the button through
faster. It didn't. So far i have put 8 skill points into sneak and
have not been able to use it once. Is this normal? or do you all think
that maybe mine is screwed up?

Tadian of Veeshan
